text: Black and White in Color is a 1976 Ivorian French World War I comedy movie directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud and starring Jean Carmet, Jacques Dufilho, Catherine Rouvel, Jacques Spiesser, Maurice Barrier. It won an Academy Award in 1977. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 comedy movies Category:1976 war movies Category:Ivorian movies Category:French comedy movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud Category:Movies set in Cameroon Category:Movies set in Ivory Coast
title: Black and White in Color
